import React,{Component} from 'react'; import './AdminPage.css'; import AdminNavBar from '../../layout/AdminNavbar'; import UserDescription from '../../layout/UserDescription'; import axios from "axios"; class AdminPage extends Component { state = { loaded: false, data:{}, length:0, offers_loaded:false, }; componentDidMount() { axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/getAllUsers") .then(res => { if(res.data.success===true){ this.setState({ loaded: true,data:res.data.data,length:res.data.length }); }else { this.setState({ loaded: false,data:"Error in loading data" }); } }) // Trigger update } /*deleteRow(id){ console.log('aaaa',id) let row=[...this.state.data] console.log('aaaa',row) row.splice(id, 1) this.setState({ data:row }); }*/ render() { return ( <>
